snippet: Deron Williams formally committed to a five-year deal with the Nets Tuesday evening, boosting their fortunes on and off the court as the franchise moves to Brooklyn this fall.
abstract: NBA star guard Deron Williams formally commits to a five-year deal with the Brooklyn Nets, boosting their fortunes on and off the cour as the franchise move to their new arena this fall.
lead_paragraph: Deron Williams formally committed to a five-year deal with the Nets Tuesday evening, boosting their fortunes on and off the court as the franchise moves to Brooklyn this fall.

headline.seo: Deron Williams Agrees to 5-Year Deal With Nets
headline.main: Nets Place Star Point Guard Atop Their New Arena
